comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: "Four unidentified men and a horse discussing a large pile of wood, Drouin, Victoria." Lovin' these photos of Drouin!

comment.author: 14812488@N00
comment._content:
Andrew Reid of  Snowballs Rd. Longwarry would cut wood & send to Melbourne via rail for to keep the Citizens warm as landholders got no pension  & with a wife  three grown children 
also seeking a livelyhood from small holding times were tough. He died 1940.
